title: Deep Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Informal Learning Environment-Based Scientific Inquiry Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design and implement scientific inquiry processes in informal learning environments.
Learners can explain core concepts in physics, biology, chemistry, and computer science by connecting them to real-life problems.
Learners can develop a positive attitude toward scientific activities and establish plans for pursuing higher education.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
